verses.verse: The <S%H1697>Word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> that came to <S%H3100>Joel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6602>Pethuel.<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H2205>this,<s%> you elders, And <S%H238>listen,<s%> all you <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%> Has this ever happened in your <S%H3117>days,<s%> or <S%H518>in<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers?<s%>

<S%H5608>Tell<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> about <S%H1121>it,<s%> and have your children tell their <S%H1121>children,<s%> and their <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H1755>generation.<s%>

What the swarming <S%H1501>locust<s%> has <S%H3499>left,<s%> the great <S%H697>locust<s%> has <S%H398>eaten.<s%> What the great <S%H697>locust<s%> has <S%H3499>left,<s%> the <S%H3218>grasshopper<s%> has <S%H398>eaten.<s%> What the <S%H3218>grasshopper<s%> has <S%H3499>left,<s%> the <S%H2625>caterpillar<s%> has <S%H398>eaten.<s%>

<S%H6974>Wake<s%> <S%H7910>up,<s%> you drunkards, and <S%H1058>weep!<s%> <S%H3213>Wail,<s%> all you <S%H8354>drinkers<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> because of the sweet <S%H6071>wine;<s%> for it is cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

For a <S%H1471>nation<s%> has come <S%H5927>up<s%> on my <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H6099>strong,<s%> and without <S%H4557>number.<s%> His <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of a <S%H738>lion,<s%> and he has the <S%H4973>fangs<s%> of a <S%H3833>lioness.<s%>

He has <S%H7760>laid<s%> my <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H8047>waste,<s%> and <S%H7111>stripped<s%> my fig <S%H8384>tree.<s%> He has <S%H2834>stripped<s%> its <S%H2834>bark,<s%> and thrown it <S%H7993>away.<s%> Its <S%H8299>branches<s%> are made <S%H3835>white.<s%>
<S%H421>Mourn<s%> like a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H2296>dressed<s%> in <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> for the <S%H1167>husband<s%> of her <S%H5271>youth!<s%>

The meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> and the drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> are cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%> The <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H8334>ministers,<s%> <S%H56>mourn.<s%>

The <S%H7704>field<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste.<s%> The <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H56>mourns,<s%> for the <S%H1715>grain<s%> is <S%H7703>destroyed,<s%> The new <S%H8492>wine<s%> has dried <S%H3001>up,<s%> and the <S%H3323>oil<s%> <S%H535>languishes.<s%>

Be <S%H3001>confounded,<s%> you <S%H406>farmers!<s%> <S%H3213>Wail,<s%> you vineyard <S%H3755>keepers;<s%> for the <S%H2406>wheat<s%> and for the <S%H8184>barley;<s%> for the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> has <S%H6>perished.<s%>

The <S%H1612>vine<s%> has dried <S%H3001>up,<s%> and the fig <S%H8384>tree<s%> <S%H535>withered;<s%> the <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%> <S%H8598>tree,<s%> the palm tree <S%H8598>also,<s%> and the apple tree, even all of the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> are <S%H3001>withered;<s%> for <S%H8342>joy<s%> has withered <S%H3001>away<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>

<S%H2296>Put<s%> on sackcloth and <S%H5594>mourn,<s%> you <S%H3548>priests!<s%> <S%H3213>Wail,<s%> you <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%> <S%H935>Come,<s%> lie all <S%H3885>night<s%> in <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> you <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of my <S%H430>God,<s%> for the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> and the drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> are <S%H4513>withheld<s%> from your <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H6942>Sanctify<s%> a <S%H6685>fast.<s%> <S%H7121>Call<s%> a solemn <S%H6116>assembly.<s%> <S%H622>Gather<s%> the <S%H2205>elders,<s%> and all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H2199>cry<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H162>Alas<s%> for the <S%H3117>day!<s%> For the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is at <S%H7138>hand,<s%> and it will <S%H935>come<s%> as <S%H7701>destruction<s%> from the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>
<S%H400>Isn't<s%> the food cut <S%H3772>off<s%> before our <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> <S%H8057>joy<s%> and <S%H1524>gladness<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God?<s%>

The <S%H6507>seeds<s%> <S%H5685>rot<s%> under their <S%H4053>clods.<s%> The <S%H214>granaries<s%> are laid <S%H8074>desolate.<s%> The <S%H214>barns<s%> are broken <S%H2040>down,<s%> for the <S%H1715>grain<s%> has <S%H3001>withered.<s%>

How the <S%H929>animals<s%> <S%H584>groan!<s%> The <S%H5739>herds<s%> of <S%H1241>livestock<s%> are <S%H943>perplexed,<s%> because they have no <S%H4829>pasture.<s%> <S%H5739>Yes,<s%> the flocks of <S%H6629>sheep<s%> are made <S%H816>desolate.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> I <S%H7121>cry<s%> to <S%H784>you,<s%> For the fire has <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H4999>pastures<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and the <S%H3852>flame<s%> has <S%H3857>burned<s%> all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

<S%H929>Yes,<s%> the animals of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H6165>pant<s%> to <S%H4325>you,<s%> for the water <S%H650>brooks<s%> have dried <S%H3001>up,<s%> And the <S%H784>fire<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H4999>pastures<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>
